full_text: ie eel El iw 2020/KER/1355 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON FRIDAY, THE 10TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 20TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.8539 OF 2019(F) CRIME NO.1162/2019 OF Kuravilangadu Police Station , Kottayam PETITIONERS/ACCUSED 1 TO 4: 1 GIREESH AGED 28 YEARS S/O KUNJUMON , KANNALAPARAMBIL HOUSE, VATTUKULAM.P.O, KADAPOOR,KOTTAYAM-686587. 2 SANDEEP @ SONUMON, AGED 29 YEARS S/O SAJEEV,PARAYANATTU HOUSE, KOODALLOOR.P.O, KOTTAYAM-686572. 3 ANURAJ P.S, AGED 28 YEARS S/O SHIVARAMA PERUMAL, PARAYANATTU HOUSE, KOODALLOOR.P.O, KOTTAYAM-686587 4 NITHIN GEORGE, AGED 28 YEARS S/O GEORGE T.M, THOTTIKULANGARA HOUSE , KADAPPOOR KARA, VATTUPURA, KOTTAYAM-686583. BY ADVS. SRI.C..VINOD KUMAR SRI.P.M.MANASH RESPONDENTS/STATE & DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REP.BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,HIGH COURT OF KERALA , ERNAKULAM- 682031. ipsa rl El iw 2020/KER/1355 CrLMC 8539/2019 2 2 SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE KURAVILANGADU POLICE STATION, KURAVILANGADU , KOTTAYAM- 686633. 3 ABIN JOSE S/O JOSE, AGED 35 YEARS, VADAKKEMATTAPPALLY, VAZHAKKALA BHAGAM, KURAVILANGADU , KOTTAYAM- 686633. R3 BY ADV. V.C.MADHAVANKUTTY OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 10.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING : Bp stl 2020/KER/1355 CrL.MC 8539/2019 3 ASHOK MENON, J. rT.MC No.8539 of 2019 Dated this the 10% day of January, 2020 ORDER Petitioners are accused in Crime No.1162/2019 of Kuravilangadu Police Station for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 294(b), 341, 323 and 326 read with Section 34 IPC. 2. The only defacto complainant/injured is the third respondent herein. He has appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that he has no grievance against them. A report to that effect has also been obtained from the investigating officer through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. No public interest is involved. The injury sustained by the third respondent is not life threatening. In the result, the Criminal M.cC. is allowed and 2020/KER/1355 Cr. MC 8539/2019 4 the entire proceedings as against the petitioners herein in Crime No.1162/2019 of Kuravilangadu Police Station shall stand quashed under Section 482 cr.PcC and the petitioners/accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE 59 ipsa rl aes a El iw 2020/KER/1355 Crl.MC 8539/2019 5 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.1162/19 OF KURAVILANGADU POLICE STATION ON THE FILE OF THE HON'BLE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE- 1,PALA,KOTTAYAM DISTRICT. ANNEXURE A2 AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT.
